CustomField.inlineHelpText: Define when the list buttons are enabled. - When Records are Selected in the List: the action button is only enabled when users select records in the list. The selected records are passed to the flow - When Records are Loaded: the action button is only enabled when records have been loaded in the list. The loaded records are passed to the flow - Always: the action button is enabled all the time. The loaded records are passed to the flow
CustomField.label: List Action Availability
